motorcycle-usa.com/2015/04/exciting-list.snippet: List of Riders for X Games first ever X Games Step Up qualifier will take place in conjunction with the GEICO EnduroCross event in Las Vegas on Friday, May 1st. Several riders will be competing for one of three invites to X Games in Austin, Texas.
